php.java.faces
Class PhpFacesApplication

java.lang.Object
  javax.faces.application.Application
      php.java.faces.PhpFacesApplication

public class PhpFacesApplication
extends javax.faces.application.Application

A custom Application, overrides getPropertyResolver.

Author:
jostb
